chapters.title: Chapter 22:  To Make an Anchor Weep
chapters.info:
Coramoor,
      p. 468â€”According to the Sea Folk's Jendai Prophecy, the man who is
      destined to bring them out of their long wandering in the sea.  He is
      the same man who is the fulfillment of just about every other prophecy
      known as well, Rand al'Thor.
      See also
      al'Thor, Rand;
      Car'a'carn;
      Dragon Reborn.
